thread.title: NYPD Officer Shot in Head, Dies
thread.title_full: NYPD Officer Shot in Head, Dies

title: NYPD Officer Shot in Head, Dies
text:
> National NYPD Officer Shot in Head, Dies A New York City police officer has died after being shot while responding to a report of a man armed with a gun. A suspect was taken into custody. (Oct. 21) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
